title: Contact
description: Call me, beep me, if you wanna reach me.

props.content:
Heading

We're out in the middle of nowhere, nobody knows we're here, we have no way to contact anyone, and our parents have gone insane.

Want to work together?

Humor may lift your spirits, Daria, but it takes a professional to lift your buttocks! Doctor's joke! Have a nice day girls. And remember, money can make anyone look beautiful.
